http:request.doc:name: Call mongo-sapi parameters
http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { "source" : vars.headers.source, systemId : vars.systemId, "x-correlation-id" : correlationId, "name" : vars.headers.name, "client_secret" : p('mongo-sapi.client_secret'), "client_id" : p('mongo-sapi.client_id') }]
